rows.label: tlk400702_msg0001
rows.name:
Right, you'll have to check the Invidian
Merc Missions first. From there,
accept the "First Mission".

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0002
rows.name:
Ah, but if you don't have a Blade to
spare, it'll have to wait until you
bond with some more...

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0003
rows.name: Looks like you've accepted it. Good.

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0004
rows.name:
Now all you need to do is wait for the
Blades you assigned to finish their job.

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0005
rows.name:
It's only a simple practice mission,
so I'm sure they'll be back in no time.

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0006
rows.name:
Oh, sorry, I guess there's one
thing I forgot to explain.

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0007
rows.name:
Once a Merc Mission ends, the
Blades you sent will report in.

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0008
rows.name:
That's when you'll find out how it went.
And of course, you'll get your rewards.

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0009
rows.name:
Point is, for a Merc Mission to be
properly complete, you need to
check in and collect the reward.

rows.label: tlk400702_msg0010
rows.name: Go on, give it a go now.
